title: Does Cassiopeia have a silence ability in her kit?
body: 'cause riot is totally mute about her, with this preseason where mages are so unfavored, Cassiopeia is just a troll pick, heck, she did not even receive the mana compensatio buff like the other mages. Lissandra either.

replies.body: Well, they did not answer why she did not get the mana compensatio buff. She is soo unfavored right now, specially with the buff to AD. AD middle assasins like Talon, Zed and even Yasuo will just shred her so easily.
she's getting a rework this season (probably a buff) but not sure when
